name: .CDTX File Extension
summary: Learn about .CDTX files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A CDTX file is a diagram template saved in the XML standard and created by ConceptDraw DIAGRAM, a diagram-creating application. It stores information about a diagram, such as shapes, text, lines, symbols, and metadata. CDTX files are similar to the more common .CDT files, but store information in the easier-to-read XML format instead of binary format, making transferring template information more convenient.

content: ConceptDraw DIAGRAM is a technical drawing application for Windows and macOS. Amateur and professional users may utilize the software to diagram various processes, from sports positions on a playing field to the complexities of a 100-person organization. The CDTX
NOTE: ConceptDraw Pro uses "x" at the end of the file extension, e.g., .CDX for .CDD, to signify the XML version.
